glsa.title: Quagga: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Quagga, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: Quagga is a free routing daemon replacing Zebra supporting RIP, OSPF and BGP.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Quagga. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Quagga users should upgrade to the latest version:
